title: Portfolio Optimization Rules beyond the Mean-Variance Approach. (arXiv:2305.08530v1 [q-fin.PM])
abstract: In this paper, we revisit the relationship between investors' utility functions and portfolio allocation rules. We derive portfolio allocation rules for asymmetric Laplace distributed $ALD(\mu,\sigma,\kappa)$ returns and compare them with the mean-variance approach, which is based on Gaussian returns. We reveal that in the limit of small $\frac{\mu}{\sigma}$, the Markowitz contribution is accompanied by a skewness term. We also obtain the allocation rules when the expected return is a random normal variable in an average and worst-case scenarios, which allows us to take into account uncertainty of the predicted returns. An optimal worst-case scenario solution smoothly approximates between equal weights and minimum variance portfolio, presenting an attractive convex alternative to the risk parity portfolio. translated_title: 超越均值方差法的投资组合优化规则
translated_abstract: 本文重新探讨了投资者效用函数和投资组合分配规则之间的关系。我们推导了基于非对称拉普拉斯分布$ALD(\mu,\sigma,\kappa)$收益率的投资组合分配规则，并将它们与基于高斯收益率的均值方差方法进行了比较。我们发现，在$\frac{\mu}{\sigma}$趋近于零的极限情况下，马科威茨贡献伴随着一个偏度项。当预期回报是一个随机正态变量的时候，我们还获得了投资组合分配规则，考虑到了预测回报的不确定性。最优的最坏情况解决方案在等重量和最小方差投资组合之间平滑逼近，是风险均衡投资组合的一种有吸引力的凸替代方案。我们利用一个带有随机漂移的微观投资组合模型和以对数正态分布的横截面收益率为特征的预期效用函数的解析式来进行演示。
tldr: 本文提出了基于非对称拉普拉斯分布收益率的投资组合分配规则，并解决了预期回报是随机变量时的不确定性问题。最优的最坏情况解决方案可以平滑逼近等重量和最小方差投资组合，是风险均衡投资组合的一个凸替代方案。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes portfolio allocation rules based on asymmetric Laplace distributed returns and addresses the uncertainty of predicted returns when expected return is a random variable. The optimal worst-case scenario solution smoothly approximates equal weights and minimum variance portfolio, making it an attractive convex alternative to risk parity portfolio.
